description:
Light and versatile, this rack will fit everything from kid’s bikes to fat bikes. One of the lightest hitch-mounted racks available (only 16kg), the DoubleTrack Pro XT 2 is easy install and remove. The folding design tucks out of the way when not in use. Or if you need trunk access when your bikes are loaded, you can tilt the rack away from the car.

  • Sturdy steel construction
  • Fits bikes with wheels between 16 and 29in
  • Compatible with tires up to 5in. wide
  • Space between bikes allows use with multiple bikes with Boost spacing and fat bikes
  • Tool-free installation and removal with Thule® AutoAttach™ system
  • Folds away when not in use, tilts for rear access when loaded
  • Bikes locks to rack, rack locks to vehicle with the same key
  • 25cm clearance between bikes fits a range of frame size
  • Max load is 37.5lb. per tray, 75lb. total
name: Thule DoubleTrack Pro XT 2-Bike Hitch Mount Rack
